data.comment: 4147 spectators have come along to watch today.
The first-half is just kicking off.
Ball safe as Salt Lake is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Los Angeles in their own half.
Los Angeles have been awarded a corner by Victor Rivas.
Corner awarded to Los Angeles.
In the minute 3, Salt Lake awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Los Angeles at Rio Tinto Stadium.
Los Angeles needs to be cautious. Salt Lake have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 7, Ball goes out of play for a Salt Lake goal kick.
Salt Lake's Justin Meram is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Salt Lake.
In the minute 9, Salt Lake move into a 1-0 lead through a Damir Kreilach header.
Maikel Chang instrumental with a fine assist.
Jose Cifuentes of Los Angeles smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 11, Los Angeles pushes forward through Diego Rossi, whose finish on goal is saved.
Los Angeles have been awarded a corner by Victor Rivas.
Goal kick for Salt Lake at Rio Tinto Stadium.
In the minute 13, Pablo Ruiz gets his shot on target but fails to score for Salt Lake.
Salt Lake push forward at Rio Tinto Stadium and Pablo Ruiz gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Los Angeles defence.
Salt Lake's Maikel Chang gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 14, Los Angeles have a goal kick.
Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Salt Lake in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 18, Free kick for Salt Lake in their own half.
Victor Rivas signals a Los Angeles throw-in in Salt Lake's half.
Free kick for Los Angeles in the half of Salt Lake.
In the minute 20, Victor Rivas awards the home team a throw-in.
Los Angeles push upfield but Victor Rivas quickly pulls them for offside.
Salt Lake awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 23, Los Angeles have been awarded a corner by Victor Rivas.
Salt Lake's Donny Toia breaks free at Rio Tinto Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Victor Rivas awards Los Angeles a goal kick.
In the minute 25, Salt Lake's Pablo Ruiz misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sandy.
Throw-in for Salt Lake in the half of Los Angeles.
In the minute 26, Throw-in Los Angeles.
Albert Rusnak (Salt Lake) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In Sandy Salt Lake drive forward through Aaron Herrera. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 28, Free kick Los Angeles.
Attention is being given to Salt Lakeâ€™s Damir Kreilach and play has been suspended briefly.
Damir Kreilach is back on the pitch.
In the minute 33, Throw-in Salt Lake.
Jose Cifuentes for Los Angeles drives towards goal at Rio Tinto Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Los Angeles.
In the minute 36, In Sandy Los Angeles attack through Mohamed Traore. The finish is off target, however.
Salt Lake have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Salt Lake is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 37, Los Angeles drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Los Angeles awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Justin Meram for Salt Lake gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 39, Goal kick for Los Angeles at Rio Tinto Stadium.
Throw-in for Salt Lake at Rio Tinto Stadium.
Victor Rivas awards Salt Lake a goal kick.
In the minute 40, Los Angeles awarded a free kick in their own half.
Los Angeles to take a throw-in in Salt Lake territory.
Albert Rusnak for Salt Lake gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 41, Ball goes out of play for a Los Angeles goal kick.
Free kick for Salt Lake in their own half.
Salt Lake are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 45, Can Los Angeles capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 45, Bob Bradley (Los Angeles) is making a first substitution, with Eddie Segura replacing Mohamed Traore.
The away team have replaced Bryce Duke with Latif Blessing. This is the second substitution made today by Bob Bradley.
Tristan Blackmon is replacing Andy Najar for Los Angeles at Rio Tinto Stadium.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 47, Goal! Salt Lake extend their lead to 2-0 through Justin Meram.
Damir Kreilach (Salt Lake) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sandy.
In the minute 61, Salt Lake's Pablo Ruiz has been booked in Sandy.
The home team replace Justin Meram with Douglas Martinez.
Freddy Juarez is making the team's second substitution at Rio Tinto Stadium with Everton Luiz replacing Pablo Ruiz.
In the minute 63, Los Angeles's Brian Rodriguez gets in a shot on goal at Rio Tinto Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Los Angeles make their fourth substitution with Bradley Wright-Phillips replacing Danny Musovski.
Jose Cifuentes for Los Angeles has been booked by Victor Rivas and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 70, Justen Glad (Salt Lake) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 74, Can Los Angeles get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Salt Lake's half?
Adrien Perez is replacing Jose Cifuentes for Los Angeles at Rio Tinto Stadium.
Jordan Harvey is booked for the away team.
Salt Lake have extended their lead to 3-0 courtesy of a Albert Rusnak penalty.
In the minute 80, Throw-in for Salt Lake in their own half.
In the minute 82, Can Salt Lake capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Los Angeles's half?
The home team have replaced Damir Kreilach with Jeizon Ramirez. This is the third substitution made today by Freddy Juarez.
Kyle Beckerman is on a sub for Maikel Chang for Salt Lake.
Kyle Beckerman (Salt Lake) has received a first yellow card.
Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Salt Lake in their own half.
Los Angeles have a dangerous throw-in.
Milan Iloski is replacing Corey Baird for the home team.
